name: Attack of the Flyclones
description:
Controls

Mouse Click: Shoot

A: Left

D: Right

Shoot as many red and gold birds as you can without hitting the blue
bird to achieve high scores. Over time the blue bird will grows which increases the difficulty. Every 40 seconds 1 of 4 different power-ups will spawn which you can shoot to either get a new gun, or a helper for 15 seconds.
